meanings.def: the state of needing the help and support of somebody/something in order to survive or be successful
examples: Our relationship was based on mutual dependence.
dependence on/upon somebody/something his dependence on his parents
the dependence of Europe on imported foods
The government wants to reduce industry's dependence on coal.
a heavy dependence on imported materials
her economic dependence on her husband
his total dependence on his family
Their relationship is based on a strong mutual dependence.

meanings.def: the state of being addicted to something (= unable to stop taking or using it)
the fact of one thing being affected by another
examples: the close dependence of soil and landforms
